Html:
I can't get the July 2009 source to compile.

I get errors in the DataVisualization design projects.
Stuff like: "The type or namespace name 'Metadata' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.Windows.Design' (are you missing an assembly reference?)"

Am I missing an assembly?

Could you please have a look at the "Build Notes" section of the following post:

http://blogs.msdn.com/delay/archive/2009/06/25/wpf-charting-it-s-official-june-2009-release-of-the-wpf-toolkit-is-now-available.aspx

The problem you're reporting sounds a lot like what I describe there - along with details for avoiding it.

Hope this helps!
Thanks, it builds when I unload the *.Design projects.
